plugin.tooltip: Read Esri (shp, shx and dbf) files into WKT String. Supported files : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ

localized_tooltip.tooltip: Read Esri (shp, shx and dbf) files into WKT String. Supported files : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ
Lecture de fichiers Esri (shp, shx et dbf) avec encodage des géométries au format WKT. Fichiers supportés : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ
